review_text: Easy and convenient stay!
This place was a wonderful visit. It provided us with space and comfort.
Older house with renovated interior. Hosts are responsive, interior is clean with amenities (kitchen supplies, shampoo/conditioner, coffee, etc). Comfortable weekend stay!
Great stay would recommend and will stay again when in the area

The floors were all slanted and soft, the refrigerator door wasn’t able to open all the way due to the warped floor. Stairs to the upstairs were pretty steep so if you’re handicapped or older, beware, beds were very hard, it’s an older house in an older neighborhood, we wouldn’t stay here again. If you’re looking for basic this place is for you
The house worked well for us as we visited family nearby. Must keep in mind that it is an old house, but the furnishings are up to date and it is clean and pleasant. Would stay here again.
Nice place to stay with my family while traveling. Plenty of space for all of us!

The owner was very responsive. I accidentally put the wrong number of visitors on the initial reservation and they did not get upset and even let us check in a little earlier. That was truly a blessing because we were coming off a 6hr drive. Thank you for your kindness as well as a place that felt like home. We will, when in town, be utilizing this place again. God bless!!!
A Franklin
Great place definitely would recommend very friendly and easy going
Unique layout and pleasant surroundings. Plan on coming in spring so we can use the porch, fire pit and grill!
Owners were very accommodating and kind. The space is much more than expected. Very nice and has everything you need.

Had a great stay at Mike’s deer track lodge
I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a place to stay in sidney
Very clean

The place was fantastic in every way. Comfortable, had everything we needed and Mike was super helpful. Would definitively stay again, beats the hotels hands down. The kitchen and the apartment had everything we needed, even the OH game on the Big Ten network. A great stay.
Probably the best Air B&B I ever stayed at. Such a clean place in a great location. The hosts are great. Very friendly and down-to-home. I give it an 11 out of 10.

Great space! Especially enjoyed the outside patio in the evenings. It was a perfect stay for our small family of 4 while we visited family in the area. Nothing like having a home base with a kitchen and living area while traveling.
Very nice
Everything is just as pictured, the home was clean & had everything we needed. Mike & his wife were so friendly and hospitable, would love to stay again!

Staying at This AirBnB was an absolute treat. Mike and Wanda were excellent hosts and very knowledgeable about the area. They gave us wonderful recommendations for food and entertainment. The location was private and pristine. Would absolutely stay again! Thank you

Wonderful stay, Beautiful Place Mike and Wanda are wonderful hosts. They communicated every step of the way. The room was spotless, quiet, warm and comfortable. If I am in the area again, I will be staying at Deer Track.
Very nicely furnished, close to town. Mike is a great host. I highly recommend this accommodation.
Great place to stay! Cozy, clean, centrally located in Sidney! I would definitely stay again if I was in the area!
Great place and would highly recommend!
A great spot with great hosts!
What a beautiful, cozy atmosphere- would definitely recommend and come back for another stay!!
Great place to stay. Very clean. Will recommend. Susan
Quiet secluded spot yet close to downtown and highway. Everything is like new and the space is fully equipped with all the necessities.
Really great place owned by great hosts! So clean with a really nice feel.

Mike’s place was incredibly comfortable, extremely clean, and beautiful! Close proximity to the Buckeye Barn in Piqua! We stayed here for a wedding and couldn’t love it more! Mike & Wanda were gracious, flexible, and just overall wonderful people! Would highly recommend! Can’t wait to visit again!
Absolutely great place to stay. Very clean and Mike provides everything you need. Five star for this place.
Friendly hosts, great atmosphere, relaxing wooded patio view. Just a good experience.
Very clean and spacious. Hosts were nice and location is convenient to town.
Very nice place with nicer people.

Appreciated the amazing hospitality shown to our guest. Wonderful living space with lots of amenities. Very quick responses when communicating with Michael. Overall, great customer service and will recommend to others that may need a place to stay.
The place was extremely nice and Mike and his wife were as hospitable as they could of possibly been! If I ever venture back to Sydney this will for sure be my first choice in places to stay!
Beautiful home, nice and quiet location. Mike and his Wife are two of the most amazing hosts I’ve had since using Airbnb. 10/10 highly recommend staying here.
amazing experience peacefully and very quiet
Love the place! Very comfortable and relaxing in a beautiful setting! Great host! Highly recommend!

What a great place for the Eclipse. It was dead center for Totality. The park nearby the house offered a wonderful atmosphere for viewing. We are so glad we chose this house for our stay.
You can really tell that Kayla put a lot of love into decorating the house. It is comfortable and welcoming.
Very nice getaway spot for a few days. Kayla was very responsive and the place was perfect

I love coming back to the Lake Cottage! This time several sisters joined me on retreat and we had a peaceful, restful stay. We enjoyed local restaurants and the well-equipped kitchen for meals at the cottage; beautiful walks around the neighborhood and lake; excellent sleep in the cozy beds; and the perfect space for quiet times, prayerful conversation and fellowship. Highly recommend.
Kayla was so hospitable and very responsive. It was a beautiful place to stay and we felt right at home! It was exactly what we needed. I hope that we will have the opportunity to return!
I love this cottage. It is beautifully decorated and very peaceful. Great little get-a-way for this winter.

I have had the great pleasure to stay here a few times now. This time, my husband and I enjoyed our annual personal retreat. It was such a special time away. We had everything we needed in the kitchen to enjoy simple meals in and the setting was absolutely perfect for times of quiet reflection, conversation and prayer. We can't wait to come back!
Super friendly hosts. Really appreciated the peace and quiet and privacy. Great area and location.
What a great stay! Very cozy cottage that made me feel at home. Definitely will be back in the future!
Kayla was so helpful and quick to respond to any question or concern I had. She made the stay as seamless as possible!
Had a great stay at the lake!

I have stayed in many AirBNB properties over the years and Kurt and Kayla's place ranks at the top! Kayla is such a considerate and responsive host - she truly has thought of everything. I felt comfortable, peaceful and right at home. I love to cook and brought some of my favorite tools and spices, but was pleasantly surprised by the well-stocked kitchen. This was an ideal spot for a writing retreat. I thoroughly enjoyed the beauty of walking and writing by the nearby lake at Blackberry Island. I loved that there were bikes, camping chairs and hammocks to borrow. I am looking forward to returning this winter for my annual new year retreat!

Kayla is a fantastic host in all ways. Her attention to detail with in the home is amazing and her willingness to share ideas of things to do and respond is fantastic. I would highly recommend the cottage!
This place is so peaceful and beautifully decorated! We really enjoyed our time there.
Kayla was so hospitable and always responsive. It was a beautiful place to stay and we felt right at home! We look forward to staying there again sometime!
Beautiful cottage! Great place to get away and relax. Can't wait to go back.

If you’re looking for a peaceful escape, look no further. Kayla’s attention to detail has helped to create a place for respite and relaxation. Have a question? She is extremely responsive - the best I’ve experienced. My girls and I went over to Do Good Restaurant & Ministry in Osgood for breakfast. Not only was it yummy and a good deal, but we loved their mission. Popped up to Celina and Grand Lake St Mary. If you have kids, their accessible playground was fantastic (we also found some great deals at a thrift shop there!).. We were able to enjoy sunshine sparkling on the lake, curl up in front of the fireplace during the rain, and kick through the leaves on a walk around Blackberry Island. It was exactly what we needed. I hope that we will have the opportunity to return!

Lovely little house. Clean and well-appointed. Thank you for a great stay. Loved the offer to use the bikes, hammocks and fire pit. Unfortunately, the weather and our plans did not allow us to take advantage of them, but would have been great.
Absolutely beautiful home and cozy place to stay

The cottage was VERY cute. Bedrooms tiny, but the beds were very comfortable & the living room/ kitchen were open and airy feeling. We had an issue with the water that I was told might “sometimes have an odor.” The sulfuric smell of the water was so pungent that we could not brush our teeth with it. I showered and was told by my family I smelled like rotten eggs… for 7 hrs! When I contacted Kayla she sent her husband out to treat the water, which he did. There was a bleach smell after that, but better than rotten eggs. I’m sure the issue will be permanently fixed before others are going to book and stay.

Kayla and Kurt have created a beautiful space! The amenities are wonderful, we especially enjoyed being able to use the bikes. An afternoon reading in the hammock was enjoyable and a bonus amenity we hadn't planned to use. Their recommendations for local restaurants was spot on.
This is a great location to have a peaceful, private retreat from a busy life...but close to wonderful food & drinks. Highly recommend it for a space for couples to reconnect with one another and soak in the small space together!
This place is a great getaway. Beautifully decorated inside and out! Quiet neighborhood. Quaint little lakeside town. Can’t wait to come back for longer.
Clean, neat, well supplied cottage in a gorgeous, peaceful setting. I would stay here again.
Love this cabin! We have made this a yearly trip now! Always a reasonable price for a quick fishing trip and a peaceful getaway. Thanks again for another great experience!
We have stayed multiple times at the cabin at the lake and have enjoyed our stays each time.
we booked the cabin for the solar eclipse and it is as perfect!
Perfect lake spot for our small 3 person family. Will definitely be using anytime we come to town.
Very nice weekend away, loved the town of Minster and we'll be back!
another beautiful stay at Martha’s place, amazing cabin
It was a great place to stay for a Birthday Weekend getaway. There are beautiful lake views from the front windows! It was also a great change to have a small kitchen to cook in.
This property is beautiful, and by far the best airbnb experience i’ve had. Thanks Martha!

Great value for a small cabin. My wife and I took our 1.5 year old and felt very cozy. There’s plenty of parks in the area. Even though there was 6 inches of snow on the ground for our visit, it was still a great time. Will be returning if we ever find ourselves back in the area!

Cute, quaint and quiet. There is a very nice river and park across the road also. We went in February so we couldn't really take advantage of this, but I am sure it is amazing during the nicer seasons.
Comfortable and nice stay
Absolutely peaceful was extremely clean had everything you would need in the kitchen nice views of the lake out front and walking distance to the state park and restaurant

Peaceful and relaxing cottage. Tastefully decorated, comfortable furniture with a wonderful deck and spectacular views of the lake. Martha is a great hostess who pays attention to the details. We will be back again!
Comfortable cottage, near state park. Expansive inside such a small footprint. Everything you need!

We are from North Carolina and had come to Minster for a family wedding in the area. Martha's was a perfect place for us to stay. It was close to the wedding venue yet felt like it was too rural to be close to anything - which we loved. We had a nice view of the lake and loved to go on the trail around the lake. The cottage was small and cozy. It had everything we needed, although maybe not everything we wanted, e.g. The kitchen has a refrigerator and stove, but no dishwasher or washing machine and dryer. The bathroom has a shower, but no bathtub; The bedroom has no closet or bureau, but there are plenty of hooks on the wall for your clothing. The best feature of the house as the living room. It was very spacious and had very plush, comfortable furniture. When we had a question about working the TV, Martha answered the phone immediately and was able to solver the problem right away.

This cottage is exactly as you see in the pictures and you get some striking views across to the park. It is right - I mean right - on the road, but I loved that as well. It wasn't a terribly busy road - more like a park road. In my 1 night stay I didn't see any speeders, but there were bicycles, scooters, a school bus and even a golf cart. It was also harvest time so several tractors with grain wagons passed by. All fun to watch from the porch. All the living room furniture was the "sink down deep" type - which works for some, and not for others. Bring more coffee if you're a more than 1 cup a morning kind of person. There was only one thing that caused me to pause and that is the window coverings. They're cute and fit the lake theme, but offer zero privacy at night with any kind of lights on. Be prepared to be on display or change in the bathroom which did have a privacy blind. LOL. A great place appropriately priced.
Great place to stay after being at the Eldora races all weekend! Very short drive and relaxing place!
Martha's cabin was comfortable and the location was beautiful.
Good view and fun place to stay!
Clean and cozy! Great stay with a lake view.
Very clean, nicely decorated, and a peaceful lake view. Just like the pictures. We plan to return!
Nice stay
Good cabin near lake and state park
Nice little stop for the night. Happy to have use of the kitchen and a large coffee maker. Comfy recliners too :)

It is a very cute little cottage that was just what we were looking for. Very quaint and tasteful decorations making you feel at the Beach. We will be another stay soon for my hubby and I to share again.
We loved our overnight stay in the cottage. It was very clean and comfortable. And Martha was quick to respond when I had a question. I would stay here again the next time we’re in the area
Great place for a quick and easy stay. Would recommend to anyone.
Nice little cabin right near the water. Will be back.
Everything was Great! Only thing something got in trash and had it everywhere before we arrived. Should have but didn't clean up....
Great place to stay.
Well kept, and the kitchen was nice for making dinner after a day out on the lake :) a great experience!
We had a great stay! It was a perfect getaway for two!
Always enjoy the stay at the little cabin. Feels like home.

This is our second stay at the cottage. We've also stayed at Martha's other location. Martha is kind and responsive. Her Airbnbs are well maintained and tastefully decorated. We had everything needed a great overnighter. So nice to sit outside on water. Great for 2 of us.
We loved our stay! This is our 3rd year and it was great as always :) Martha is the best!
Wonderful small home with perfect location right across the street from the lake and park. Great stay.
Perfect

My husband & I had a lovely weekend staying at Martha’s cabin. My family camped at the nearby campground, which made this location perfect for us..
The cabin was quaint and had all the essentials we needed. Would definitely stay again!
Martha's cabin is clean, very comfortable and just a really cool place to stay.
Nice little place for a private getaway. Definitely enjoyed my time away.
Very clean and quiet. Enjoyed our stay. Great sunrise view across the river. Good catfish fishing across the street. Great place to longboard 🤙🏽. Nice peaceful family get away.

Cute little cabin on the lake. The cabin was clean and check in was very easy. There is plenty of room for 3 adults even though the bathroom was a little on the small side. We were in town for the Dream at Eldora and it was only a 20 to 25 minute drive from the track which was awesome. We will definitely stay at Martha's place the next time we visit Eldora.
Will book this place again
Very nice cottage in a great location.

My wife and I had a great stay. Would recommend. Our adult children stayed at the campground, and we stayed in the cabin. The cabin is very close to the state park, so we got to enjoy the camping experience but got to retreat to a cozy little cabin at the end of the day. Great little restaurant just down the road. (Morries) Enjoyed a great breakfast in the morning. Clean and cozy. Great view.
small quiet cottage. perfect for a single person.
Wonderful! Can’t wait to come back!
It's got a beautiful view. cute little cabin.
Nice place to stay, beautiful view of the lake.

the place was exactly what we were looking for... a clean, quiet place about 20 minutes from eldora speedway. simple instructions and fast responses from Martha. will definitely stay again next time in town.
awesome stay again.
Great little spot! Would stay there again for sure.
Very nice stay
We had a wonderful and relaxing stay! The nearby town of Fort Loramie had an amazing brewery with excellent snacks! 10/10 would recommend you stay here! We plan on coming back!
Always enjoy the stay. Place does have a slight issue with smell of iron in water, but we usually buy our water for cooking purposes anyway.
was so relaxing and loved it can't wait to get back this summer thanks martha!
The little cottage was the perfect little getaway for our 19 year anniversary very cozy and peaceful with close restaurants and stores we will definitely be planning more stays here

This rental was just what we wanted—a cozy little cabin next to a little lake—to celebrate our anniversary. The kitchen could be better stocked, although most guests probably don’t do as much cooking as we do, and there were the basics (pots, pans, cups, etc.).
Our stay at the cabin on the lake was wonderful! It is so cute and was just what my husband and I needed for the weekend away. Highly recommend!
Wonderful little cottage on the lake!
peaceful, private relaxing stay. great location
If you are looking for a nice simple place to stay this is it. Clean,quiet, and peaceful. I was there for work and stayed over two weeks and have no complaints.

Sunrise on Lake is worth getting up early for. Accessible to lake and activities. Small restaurant down the road is a friendly atmosphere with good food. Very accommodating for 2 and the decor is sweet!
Martha was super accommodating. She was quick to respond which was appreciated and the place was nice and clean. Would definitely recommend!
The stay at the Cabin was enjoyable as usual. We are becoming regulars there because we like it so much! Really appreciate the promptness of the host to get with us if ever we have had any issues.
Water smells. Rear lighting where you park needs improved. Small bathroom with one little mirror on back of door
we'll keep this place in mind if we're in the area again...
Great place to stop for the night. shower water smelled, but other than that it was a nice little spot. convenient location.
The perfect place to chill and recoup. She even placed signage out to guide us in very late at night.
We really enjoyed our stay. Would have liked to stay longer. Loved your decor and bright rooms. Enjoyed the area very much.
A cute small plaxe to relax. Good communication and clean facility.
Great weekend get away!!

This location is great, right across the street from Lake Loramie. The interior is well-decorated and clean, with a fully-stocked kitchen of pans and utensils. There are signs to help you identify the cabin and where to pull in for parking, which was very helpful. Overall we really enjoyed our stay.
One thing to be aware of is that the wooden blinds are a bit of a privacy concern. We noticed that at night if we had the lights on it was very easy to see inside from the outside, even for the bedroom. We notified the host and she may change the blinds, but until then make sure to change your clothes with the lights off at night
Definitely an awesome little place for a quiet getaway. I highly recommend you check it out! The view was amazing as well.
Thanks for a great stay!

This house was a little small but perfect for just 2 people! It was very nice and just what we expected. The check in and check out were very easy and there were signs that helped us know where to go in and where to park.
Great cabin very clean would stay again.
Nice place to stay and was just what we expected! Would recommend to people staying in the area.
Had no problems! It was perfect.
Clean and convenient! Great stay!
Great location, great little cottage! We always enjoy our stay!

Beautiful cabin, well maintained and very clean. I would have gave this stay a glowing review. I checked in at 1:00 pm on Friday with a noon checkout on Tuesday. Weather was beautiful, cabin was awesome then it happened…I met Martha. On Tuesday, our departure date, a storm rolled in. It was pouring rain and Martha shows up at 11:30am. A half hour PRIOR to our checkout time and wants to know if we are staying another night. We said no we were waiting on the rain to pass to take our stuff out. She keeps looking at her watch and says she needs to clean the cabin. I apologize because I was thinking I must have lost time and was late getting out. No, she was early and was upset we parked in the wrong place (next to the walkway by the house). She was very rude. So, do be a Superhost … you need to not meet and talk to Martha. If she hadn’t stopped and spoke, she would have gotten a glowing review from us.
We had such a peaceful night. the cabin is adorable with a great view of the lake! would recommend 👍👍

Martha's place was perfect for our stay in Fort Loramie! A cute well maintained cottage right across the street from the lake, equipped with everything we needed for a comfortable stay. Very clean. Our favorite part was the deck and picnic table outside where we sat in the evening and enjoyed the peace and quiet. We would happily stay again anytime we're in the area!
Very nice and quiet place. I would definitely stay there again.
Great, clean place. Accurate description.
Good spot
Charming, comfortable and immaculately clean. The only drawback is that it literally sits on the side of the road.
The cabin was an absolute delight. Martha has thought of everything. I might just come alone sometime just to recharge my batteries. Very peaceful.
Great little cabin, plenty of room for me and 2 kids.
This cabin is so cute and right across from the lake. It was very clean! I would definitely stay again!
Nice little home near the lake.

Absolutely great little cabin to unwind in, completely redone inside with all the necessities! Comfy living room to set and relax in an evening.
We also enjoyed the outdoor space and setting right on the lake, to watch all the nature as well as the world pass by your front door!
Just down the road is Morries Landing, a great spot to have a bite, enjoy a beverage, and a morning cup of coffee!
Great location!
The cabin was very nice. However it’s right on the road. Also the surrounding cabins are not very nice. The area definitely needs some love.
This is a beautiful little home and perfect for a weekend getaway.
Great spot. Right across from the lake. Very clean and cozy. Has everything you need and then some.
Lovely
Clean comfortable and exactly as advertised.
Great find. Very clean and well stocked. We enjoyed our stay here. Would recommend this place to others.
Nice spot
It’s great
Definitely recommend staying here it's a beautiful place and great location for a get away
Stayed for a day but the heat was already on when I got there and a clear space to park, beautiful little place, will probably return in the summer!

Such a beautiful place and exactly what I needed!
I don't suggest arriving after dark as parking is a little tricky!

Martha was a great host! Everything was as expected, clean, and the space was cozy. When we arrived the heater was already on to warm up the space and she even made sure where we parked was good for the car. Getting into the place was very straight forward and easy, as was the departure. She had a very simple list of what to do to check out making the process very easy.

This was a quick overnight for us. Very clean and ultra cute cabin. We are considering downsizing when we retire so this was a good trial run for us. Hiccups in our stay were that there were no coffee grounds available. Not a huge deal, but we have been using Airbnb for many years and have grown accustomed to coffee being available, as we’ve never stayed where they didn’t provided the grounds or a keurig with various k cups. We went to a store and bought a tub of coffee. Other hiccups were not hearing back from messages through the app, tried to text via cell number on app but that was a wrong number, then found correct number on a business card and also on the welcome sheet. Before dinner wife wanted a shower but shower inexplicably stopped running after about two minutes, then started back after about 30 seconds, then back off. Messaged about it through app but never heard back. Finally got a message this morning after we had left. So, to sum up: really cute place def worth the cost, but def need these issues addressed.
Great spot for a weekend get away. Cottage was cozy and just right.

The cottage is lovely and in a fantastic location. Beautiful views of the lake. The pictures don’t do justice to the decor,it is so nicely decorated. The family room area and kitchen are spacious and comfortable and it was a very relaxing, pleasant stay. I will definitely come back. I had a few questions and the owner responded almost instantaneously. You couldn’t ask for better support.
Cute and quaint cabin with a good view! Great for a quick get away!

I don’t have complaints about the airbnb except someone’s half eaten ice cream left there and the old used shampoo in the shower. The rest was pretty good. There was some difficulty checking in since Martha’s profile says you have to pick up a key at a motel down the road and it was shut down. Her phone number was disconnected so we could not reach her. We finally figured out the key was in the lockbox instead of the motel. She did tell me ahead of time the lockbox code, but did not correct that we did not have to go to a motel first to pick it up. It was a bit confusing and took us a few hours to figure out. Other than that the stay was good.
Adorable little cabin with everything we needed. We will stay again next time we are in the area. Thanks Martha!

This cabin was so cute and cozy! My boyfriend and I stayed for a few days during thanksgiving week. It was beautiful and clean on the inside and had all we needed during our stay. It was extremely quiet and peaceful the whole time we were there. The view of the lake was amazing! Martha is a great host and we hope to stay here again in the near future! <3

This was a great cabin. Clean, nothing needed, all extras thought out. Good location to get to local trails at the State Park. Not many grocery stores around, so prepare for that. But the cabin was perfect. Thanks Martha!
This was the perfect place for a getaway trip! The place looks even better than the pictures. I look forward to going back when it's warmer out to enjoy the beautiful nearby outdoors even more.

My husband and I really enjoyed our stay here. This place was very well kept and clean. The heater is fantastic. Since it was chilly outside we appreciated that. Check in was really easy. The only negative thing I have to say is that the shower and sink water had a really funky smell to it.
We were very happy with our experience. Very clean and cozy. it was furnished with everything we needed, felt like home. Highly recommended.
The view and close proximity to the park is wonderful. The cottage is very clean and comfortable and I love the seaside decor. Definitely would visit again.
Exactly as described, easy to work with.
We loved our stay in this little spot. Very welcoming, everything is just the way we had hoped it would be. Definitely be getting this one again. Highly recommended.
Lovely little cabin right across from the lake. Easy drive to downtown Minster. Nice little get away spot!

Nice tiny cabin right on the lake. View and location were both great. Look for the sign out front - we missed it the first time we drove by but its clearly marked just look for it. Driveway is around back.

I enjoyed my night in Martha's cabin. The view is very peaceful and relaxing. The cabin itself was exactly as described and had everything I needed. It was very clean and comfortable. Check-in was very easy. Thank you for a great stay!
The cottage is better than advertised. It’s cozy, comfortable, and the sunrise is spectacular. It had everything we needed. We are looking forward to our next stay.
Very nice and comfortable cottage! Clean and nicely decorated. Well maintained.
Great stay in the little cabin by the lake. We enjoyed our time there and caught a few fish out of the lake! Great time, and a clean place!!
Great little place to stay
S

We agree w other review that the bed is too small and uncomfortable—its definitely smaller than queen, prob full, and two people will find themselves sinking toward each other to the middle all night (my wife and I are well below the average combined weight of a US couple). That said, most everything else was at par with the price, though there are other residences that are very close to this one that are very lacking in curb appeal. Prob worth it for those who can sacrifice a good night of sleep.
awesome sunsets and sunrise beautiful cabin clean with all necessities and it was a perfect spot and wait to stat again

Great little place. Perfect location close to the water and campground. Restaurant, bait shop and ice cream shop also very close by. AC was very cold. Easy self check in. Would stay here again. Thank you!
Nicely decorated. All new stuff. Super clean. Comfy.
5 - star stay to celebrate our anniversary! It is a quaint little place right across the street from the lake. Had everything that we needed.

Very cute and clean cottage. We enjoyed sitting on the porch looking at the lake and relaxing. Next trip down we will bring bikes since that is a popular activity here. It is very close to several trails and beach. Thanks Martha!
Great location! Very Very clean! It was the perfect size for 2 of us.
Was nice ! If you’re looking to just relax.
Just as nice as the first time!!! Perfect accomodations, spacious layout, decorated so nicely!! Fully stocked kitchen, just bring food for the grill!!! Wonderful place, we can't wait to stay again!
Very cozy place along with an amazing view of the lake. Highly recommended.
Perfect accommodations, very cute decor beautiful view of lake in AM. spacious and open floor plan. Clean and Comfortable!! Martha was kind and nice to us! recommended as 5 star.
Great

great for the price we had to leave early due to it being a handful with a child. the cabin isn't very child friendly too many open wires from lamps doors open at a tiny tap when closed all the way... alot of glass decor... otherwise great just wish air bnb would make better decisions when I filter child friendly cabin.

We were very happy with our stay at this Lake Loramie cottage. It was clean and had everything we needed for our short stay. The trickiest part is making sure you take the correct driveway to get to the cottage.
Perfect little cottage with beautiful lake views! We can’t wait to come back next year.
Excellent stay. Had a nice time fishing and it is a well decorated cabin.

We enjoyed Martha's Cottage so much. It is very nicely decorated with a Lake theme. It is so nice to wake up and see the water. We had out coffee on the bench in the front and watched the ducks, then went for a walk out on a small jetty right into the lake. While the living room is bigger than expected- as others mentioned the bed and bathroom are a bit snug for 2 people- but we managed. The cottage is separated from the lake by the main park road- we waved to joggers and bikers and boaters as they went by. We really enjoyed ourselves and would recommend the cottage to others.
Very cute, clean and comfortable. There was some road noise but I would stay there again.
Wonderful clean cottage, great location to park, fishing, local bars/restaurants - will be back!

Cute, well decorated cabin. It was clean and very comfortable. Even though I am pretty familiar with the area, I had a little trouble finding the road to the back of the cabin for parking. Other than that tiny glitch, which was no one’s fault, we had a lovely stay. We would definitely stay there again!
Perfect for 2 people! Super cute! Great view of Lake Loramie. Clean, comfy and cozy.

A cute little cabin right across from the lake! Simple, taseful and very clean accommodations. Quiet, picturesque location. The road in front has a 35 mph speed limit and traffic was not bothersome. I found a little road in the back so I could park behind the cottage. Had a couple of lovely walks at the lake. Great stay.

Very well kept cabin in a great location. Would suggest brining bikes if possible, some things just a touch too far to walk but not really worth driving either so bike would have been helpful. Cute place.
Beautiful property with great views of the lake off the front porch. Clean, cold A/C, and comfortable couch and chairs. Quaint little home for a weekend getaway. We enjoyed out stay.
The place was wonderful with a nice view of the lake. The inside was very clean and felt welcoming. Would definitely stay again.
Very cute cottage. Place was spotless when we arrived. Very quiet and peaceful area. Just what we were looking for.

Amazing place to stay in Sidney. Lot of places to eat nearby and the apartment is just awesome. Has everything you would need and very comfortable. Sauna is amazing! Easy to communicate with owners and just overall a great Airbnb.
Beautiful private cabin in the woods. Great for an intimate gathering or a long weekend getaway.
Loved, loved this place! The homemade pie was amazing. Thank you so much. Will definitely try to stay here again.

My husband and I loved this cabin. The location is very private. The cabin was clean and beds were really comfortable. We enjoyed a little walk in the woods and the new fire pit. We have put this cabin on our list of places that we would definitely stay at again. Oh I almost forgot, the cherry pie that was waiting on us when we arrived was delicious!
Many extras! Will definitely be going back

Wonderful place to stay! Beds were super comfortable. Place was clean, quiet and beautiful. The extra hospitality of fresh baked pie, farm fresh eggs, homemade strawberry jam, milk and sweet cream was comforting touch. Made us feel welcomed. Would love to stay here again!

I’m not entirely sure there are words for Scott his wife and co host! Our stay was beyond anything we could have ever imagined and then some. Scott was available for a late evening phone call and to our surprise him and his wife showed up at noon the next day to bless us on our wedding day. The house was impeccable and the pictures do not do it justice. We will never forget the hospitality and generosity we were given.
The beds were comfortable the pillows too! I personally used the down stairs shower and upstairs shower and main floor tub all were amazing. The kitchen had everything needed to cook with. The views were amazing it was such a private get away.
The hosts of this property were outstanding and again I could never sum up our experience into words. They literally feel like family to us.
We will be back and pray that everyone who visits enjoys their stay as we did.
Anyone looking to book please consider having a meal at the farmer’s daughter restaurant in Urbana.

This is a true gem! Well worth the money and the hosts go above and beyond to accommodate your needs! The fresh pie was delicious and farm fresh were amazing added touch! The cabin is peaceful, cozy, and clean. It’s well equipped for your kitchen needs and the attention to detail across the cabin made this location feel like a luxury cabin! Couldn’t recommend this location more. We will be back!

We loved our stay at Scott’s Hideaway! We had 4 couples with little kids, and it was so fun! The hosts went above and beyond to welcome us with fresh farm eggs and freshly baked bread & jam. The place was perfectly clean. The towels were soft. It was truly ideal!
We did have to be cautious with the little kids and the stairs, but thankfully we had enough adult eyes to monitor.
We would definitely stay here if we end up visiting the area again!

This was an amazing place to stay for a long weekend. Everything was so peaceful. The host was very friendly and very proactive in communicating. We absolutely loved the fresh baked bread that was there on arrival, it was so good. It was a very comfortable stay and we highly enjoyed it. I would recommend this place and I would absolutely stay there again.

Amazing place to stay for the week. Loved how peaceful everything was. Hosts were very friendly and accommodating. Comfortable beds would highly recommend anyone to stay here instead of anywhere else in the area.

The house was so peaceful. From listening to the birds in the morning to watching the deer at sunset, I did not want to leave. The hosts are top tier. It was worth every penny and more! Such a gem of a house.
We had a lovely visit! The house was spotless and everything was really well organized. The house and surrounding area were both gorgeous. We would love to return for another visit in the future!

Great place to stay, secluded private and peaceful. We were in town for business and this was so much better than hotel stays. Would be great location for weekend getaway or family retreat. Highly recommended.
Great place! Will return when in the area!
Great place!
Loved this home and the warmth of love put into it. Jeri went beyond with her gracious gifts. Felt welcomed into her home.
Jeri truly was amazing. She goes above and beyond to make your stay memorable. I’d recommend her place and we will be returning for sure!

Jeri’s place was so amazing! She went way out of her want to make us feel at home with her little touches, sweet gifts, signs, and cards. There is no doubt when I come back to Piqua, I will be staying here if it is available! So clean, so beautiful - the place Jeri put together was comfortable, fun, and perfect!!!

Wonderful location and amazing host. It was our sons first birthday and we arrived to the house and the first thing we see is a big happy birthday balloon and a little message board saying happy 1st birthday. Everything was so nice, the radio was playing some nice classic rock upon arrival too that we enjoyed. All of the beds were VERY comfy. my daughter's room even had a cup of pretty pink flowers waiting for her. all in all we loved the theme and personal story of the house and had a great stay. If we are ever in the area again we will 100% stay at this location again.

We felt at home from the moment we arrived. This home was done with a lot of love and care. The attention to detail was everywhere you looked. If you love music, you’ll love all the fun features and decor. So many thoughtful touches for those staying, even the bathroom had extra toothbrushes and toothpaste just in case you forgot yours. The kitchen had everything you needed and a bit more. On top of that, you can hang out, drink a few beverages and play pinball! Jeri is a very attentive and welcoming host. The neighborhood is quiet and the deck relaxing. Comfortable and fun place to stay.

This is a great house wonderfully decorated with lots of music touches-posters, signage etc.
Good size kitchen, three upstairs bedrooms, nice deck and backyard. Plenty of room to move around in the living and dining rooms.
It was perfect for people to share while attending a local event. Snacks provided for humans and our dogs were greatly appreciated.
Wonderful place to stay. Beautifully maintained and Jeri was an awesome host who really took care of us. I highly recommend staying here!
Awesome place to stay! Comfortable and well furnished. Will stay here again.
